name: Soup Siege
description:
Use your vast army to seize the kingdom's supply of soup in order to grow more powerful. At this rate you will control the entire kingdom soon enough!

Controls and instructions provided in game from the "How to play" section. Press Escape to return to the main menu (progress is not saved).

Optional challenges followed:

  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette.
  • Use only comic sans for any in-game font.
  • Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font.
